Quotes.Quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones weve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
Quotes.Author: Barack Obama

Quotes.Quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
Quotes.Author: Chinese proverb

Quotes.Quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Quotes.Author: Bernard Shaw

Quotes.Quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
Quotes.Author: Edmund Burke

Quotes.Quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
Quotes.Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.Quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
Quotes.Author: Helen Keller

Quotes.Quote: Great indeed is the sublimity of the Creative, to which all beings owe their beginning and which permeates all heaven.
Quotes.Author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.Quote: Any of us can achieve virtue, if by virtue we merely mean the avoidance of the vices that do not attract us.
Quotes.Author: Robert Lynd
